title: Sardar Omer Gorgag to lead PPP in Balochistan - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: Pakistan Peoples Party Chairman Bilawal Bhutto-Zardari has appointed Senator Sardar Omer Gorgag as PPPâ€™s Balochistan president.

According to a press statement issued on Wednesday by Bilawal House media cell, Rabbani Kakar has been appointed the provincial general secretary of the party, while Mir Zahoor Ahmed Buledi will assume the charge of provincial information secretary.

Published in Dawn, July 10th, 2025
